content.rendered:
Directed by Kalyan Krishna

Written by Kalyan Krishna. Satyanand

Cast Nagarjuna Akkineni (Bangarraju / Ram ‘Ramu’ Mohan). Ramya Krishnan (Satyabhama). Naga Chaitanya Akkineni (Chinna Bangarraju). Krithi Shetty (Naga Lakshmi). Sampath Raj (Sampath). Rao Ramesh (Ramesh). Brahmaji (Chinna Bangarraju’s Uncle). Vennela Kishore (Chinna Bangarraju’s Uncle). Chalapathi Rao (Chalapathi). Annapoorna (Naga Lakshmi’s Grandmother). Jhansi (Chinna Bangarraju’s Aunt). Surekha Vani (Sampath’s Wife). Praveen (Rambabu). Govind Padmasoorya (Aadi). Nagendra Babu (Yama Dharma Raja). Ravi Prakash (Indra). Duvvasi Mohan (Chitragupta). Gundu Sudharshan (Naradha). Phanindra Gollapalli (Teacher (credit only)). Meenakshi Dixit (Apsara). Darshana Banik (Apsara). Vedhika (Apsara). Daksha Nagarkar (Cameo Appearance). Faria Abdullah (Cameo Appearance). Seerat Kapoor (Apsara). Kushalini Pulapa (Naga Lakshmi’s Friend)

Languages Telugu

Producers Nagarjuna Akkineni

Production Annapurna Studios. Zee Studios
